name: df-uvc

body: |- wceq(cuvc, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cv(s1), cmpt(s3, cv(s1), cif(cfv(cur, cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))))

comment: ` ( ( R unitVec I ) `` j ) ` is the unit vector in ` ( R freeLMod I ) ` along the ` j ` axis. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
